song.englishname: You Mean The World To Me

english.segment1: I sit here with your dreams. They are screaming with. A perpetuate and constant flowing. Rhyming and flowing.
english.segment2: You mean the world to me. Are we ok? Maybe we can talk about it.
english.segment3: Do you feel prettier now?. Do you feel?
english.segment4: I can make this last. And I can hold you tightly. When loneliness has never felt so alive.
english.segment5: You look beautiful now. You look prettier now.
english.segment6: You mean the world to me. Are you ok? Maybe we can talk about it
